name: We Live in a Society
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 44, https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/we-live-in-a-society

We Live in a Society is a 2D story game taking you through the life of an office worker who faces many hardships that ultimately lead to his suicide.

This is a game I made in 48 hours, I would have loved to have had the time to make music and sound effects but I ran out of time.

Check out my portfolio, https://samuelarminana.com/

Let me know your feedback!!
